name: European Healthcare Distribution Association
goal:
GIRP, the European Healthcare Distribution Association, is the umbrella organisation for pharmaceutical full-line wholesalers and distributors of healthcare products and services in Europe. As the vital link in healthcare, GIRP members purchase, stock and deliver the full-range of pharmaceuticals, medical devices, in-vitro diagnostic devices, veterinarian medicinal products, food supplements, and other healthcare related products while offering support services that serve patients’ needs.
GIRP represents the national associations of over 750 pharmaceutical full-line wholesalers serving 34 European countries, as well as major international and pan-European healthcare distribution companies. GIRP members employ over 140,000 people and distribute around 15 billion packs of medicines and healthcare products per year.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Delegated acts of the Falsified Medicines Directive
Medical Devices Regulation
Animal Package
